title: Optimal tax rules, pigou taxation, and the "double dividend"
author: Sempere; Jaime
description: In this paper optimal tax formulae are computed when consumption of a commodity produces pollution. Then a test of the doublé dividend hypothesis based on the shadow prices of those formulae is proposed.
